intro: Poa litorosa, commonly known as coastal bluegrass, is a perennial grass native to the coastal regions of South America. It thrives in sandy, saline soils and is often found in dune environments. The plant has slender,丛生 stems and narrow, grass-like leaves that are typically blue-green in color.
